types1:Item.types1:Name: Process_SAP_WorkPackageCreate
types1:Item.types1:Description: Creates or updates a Business Partner and Commercial Project in SAP when an Opportunity is Closed (Won) in VForce

process.name: Process_SAP_WorkPackageCreate
process.description: Creates or updates a Business Partner and Commercial Project in SAP when an Opportunity is Closed (Won) in VForce

operation.expression: for $Line in $input.in_VFOpportunity/OpportunityProductDetails[OpportunityProduct_ProductCode != '' and OpportunityProduct_ProductCode != 'GR-RC-OV-012' and OpportunityProduct_ProductCode != 'DV0001' and SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Currency = $input.in_ProjectCurrency] return $Line

if(fn:starts-with($temp.tmp_ProductDetail[1]/OpportunityProduct_ID, 'CountryDefault') and $output.out_All_WPs_Exists=1 ) then 0 else ( if(fn:starts-with($temp.tmp_ProductDetail[1]/OpportunityProduct_ID, 'CountryDefault') and (switch ($temp.tmp_ProductDetail[1]/OpportunityProduct_ProductCode) case "FA-FR-EA-012--" return $output.out_DefaultProduct1_Exists case "GR-ES-SU-218--" return $output.out_DefaultProduct2_Exists case "GR-RC-SP-048--" return $output.out_DefaultProduct3_Exists case "GR-SC-AC-029--" return $output.out_DefaultProduct4_Exists default return 9)=1) then 0 else 1)

let $Line := $temp.tmp_ProductDetail, $itemCat := switch ($Line/Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method ) (:PS01=Fixed Price; PS02=Time & Expenses; PS06=Periodic Service; PS07=Usage Based:) case "Block" return "PS07" case "Default Product" return "PS02" case "List" return switch ($Line/ItemCategory ) case "PFP" return "PS01" case "PTE" return "PS02" case "PPS" return "PS06" default return "PS06" default return "PS06" ,$BillingCatS := switch ($itemCat) case "PS01" return "" case "PS02" return "" case "PS06" return "" case "PS07" return "NON_BILL" default return "" return <WorkPackageSet xmlns:m="urn:informatica:ae:xquery:json2xml:meta-data"> <ProjectID>{$input.in_ProjectID }</ProjectID> <WorkPackageName>{$temp.tmp_WPName } </WorkPackageName> <Description>{$temp.tmp_WPDescription }</Description> <WPStartDate>{fn:concat(fn:format-dateTime($Line/OpportunityProduct_Operational_Start_Date, "[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]"), 'T00:00:00')}</WPStartDate> <WPEndDate>{fn:concat(fn:format-dateTime($Line/OpportunityProduct_Service_End_Date, "[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]"), 'T00:00:00')}</WPEndDate> <WorkPackageType>{util:iif($Line/Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method='Block', 'U') }</WorkPackageType> <UnitQuantity>{util:iif($Line/Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method='Block', 1 )}</UnitQuantity> <UnitId>{util:iif($Line/Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method='Block', $temp.tmp_Default_UnitID) }</UnitId> <YY1_ExecutionCtryWP2_cpd>{$Line/OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode/text()}</YY1_ExecutionCtryWP2_cpd> <YY1_OpportunityID_cpd>{$input.in_OpportunityID }</YY1_OpportunityID_cpd> <DemandSet> { for $t in (1 to 9) for $cc in ('US11','IN05','IN03','SG09','GB30') return <results m:isArray="true"> <BillingControlCategory>{$BillingCatS}</BillingControlCategory> <WorkPackageName>{$temp.tmp_WPName }</WorkPackageName> <Uom>{$temp.tmp_Default_UOM }</Uom> <ResType>{$temp.tmp_Default_ResType }</ResType> <ResourceId>{'T00'||$t}</ResourceId> <Effort>{$temp.tmp_Default_Effort }</Effort> <DelvryServOrg>{$cc}</DelvryServOrg> </results> } </DemandSet> </WorkPackageSet>
let $p := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_WorkPackage[1]/Code return if ( (fn:number(replace($p,'HTTP_','')) > 299)) then 'Bad Request' else 'OK'
let $p := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_WorkPackage[1]/Code return if ( (fn:number(replace($p,'HTTP_','')) > 299) ) then 'Error occurred in child process, see error stack' else ''
